original_text: All the pillars around the court shall be filleted with silver. Their hooks shall be of silver, and their bases of bronze.
korean_text: 뜰 주위 모든 기둥의 가름대와 갈고리는 은이요 그 받침은 놋이며

sentences.original_text: All the pillars around the court shall be filleted with silver.
sentences.korean_translation: 뜰 주위의 모든 기둥은 은으로 테를 두를 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Their hooks shall be of silver,
